entry.title: How to create OAuth client credentials for SAP Entitlement Management System
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am configuring an SAP Entitlement Management system.

1) How to create OAuth Client Credentials?

2) Where do we create them? steps to create OAuth credentials

3) Will SAP be sharing this required information (OAuth Client Credentials) while Configuring the SAP EMS system.

OAuth Client Credentials

Client ID

Client Secret

Token URL

Thanks & Regards,

Vinay

entry.title: How I can view a list of transactions & the roles needed to access them?
entry.content:
Can someone tell me in the simplest terms possible how I can view a list of transactions & the roles needed to access them?

I've googled it & read a lot of comments but I cant seem to find a definitive & crystal clear answer.

I am on a helpdesk & not a SAP expert so need dummy instructions please.

All I need is

Step 1 - Get access to the following transaction for yourself first by applying for the following role/roles.

Step 2 - Go here

Step 3 - Enter the following

Step 4 - Any other instructions.

Not too much to ask surely üôÇ

Kind Regards & thanks in advance.

entry.title: SAP CPI Integration with Subscription Billing
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

we are calling an SAP Subscription system API with SAP CPI .

The below is the error we are facing

org.apache.camel.component.ahc.AhcOperationFailedException: HTTP operation failed invoking https://us10.revenue.cloud.sap/api/product-service/v1/products/search?changedAfter=2021-12-09T00:00:00.000Z&pageSize=50&published=true with statusCode: 400.

We deployed the OAuth Client credentials as is.

The same thing we did in sandbox and Quality system and it was able to fecth the data successfully from SAP SB system "us10.revenue.cloud.sap/api".

Could you please let us know is there any confugration issue need to be done on SAP Cloud platform cockpit for SAP SB- Production environment.

Thanks & Regards,

Vinay

entry.title: Entitlement Model creation
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We need to design an entitlement model,

We have a requirement where we have an offering(Material) in entitlement generation payload and this offering has multiple offers(discounts) and these discounts has characteristics(Attributes), The name of the characteristics under offers is same but has different values.

Could you please help us how we can design the entitlement models.

<offerID>ABC</OfferID>

< Service> 123</Service>

< duration> 25 min</duration>

<contact> test<contact>

< Serice> 567</service>

< duration> 30 min</duration>

<contact> pro<contact>

Thanks & Regards,

Vinay.

entry.title: SAP Entitlement Management system updated features queries
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have few queries with respect to new release of SAP Entitlement Management System 2211.

1) What the role/use of "Entitlement Function" in Configuration?

2) In what cases/scenarios can " Entitlement Processes" be used & parameters involved in it.

Could you please help us understand the related topics.

Regards,

Vinay.

entry.title: SAP Entitlement Management API Call from Provisioning system
entry.content:
We are using SAP Entitlement management to create customer entitlements.

We have website where in user can login to download software.

However before customer is allowed to download software from the website, API call needs to be made to SAP Entitlement management to check if customer is authorized to download.

There are series of checks within Customer Entitlement record and also API call needs to be made to S4 HANA system and some custom logic needs to be written before API can return response to the calling e-commerce application if customer is authorized to download software.

Question:

Is there way to create your own custom endpoint that website can call? In other words is there way to create in SAP Entitlement management like we can do in S4 HANA ERP system Odata service API that has custom logic written in ABAP and can send response back after series of check?

entry.title: Use cases for Split/Transfer/Merge entitlement records in SAP EMS
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Could you please help us in understanding the use cases & use of the functionality for Split/Transfer/Merge Entitlement in SAP Entitlement Management System.

Thanks,

Vinay.

entry.title: The update of field [ItemValidFrom,ItemValidTo] is not supported
entry.content:
Hi

We are using the Entitlement Management API for update the existing entitlement record. Following error appeared while executing ''The update of field [ItemValidFrom,ItemValidTo] is not supported''. Can you please guide how this can be resolved.

Best Regards

Manoj

entry.title: How to charge for On/Off product features when modifying subscription
entry.content:
Id like to get ideas on best approach to modelling ‚ÄòON/ OFF‚Äô product features and apply associated charge for their use in addition to the basic subscription charge. Can I do this in SB alone or is including EMS a better approach

These features could be sold with the basic car or ordered anytime during the cars subscription lifetime.

EG. Advanced Driving Services such as Turning 4WD on/off when you drive car to the mountains or go skiing at 30 Euros for a week.

Another example is of adding additional horse power when you are towing a caravan at 100 Euros per month.

These charges are added on top of basic recurring charge and then withdrawn at end of required period.

entry.title: Can entitlements be shared amongst a customer hierarchy (of-setting)
entry.content:
Can entitlements be shared amongst multiple business partners.

Or can EMS allow creation of entitlements that are shared by eg departments/ subsidiaries/ locations.

The requirement is to be able to off-set entitlements.

EG..a customer has 3 departments. Each department has 10 entitlements. When Department A has consumed its allocated 10 entitlements, its use of the 11th can be from Department B or C's quota of entitlements

entry.title: User audit logs in EMS
entry.content:
Hello there,

Is it possible to get a full audit history of what actions a user has performed against what entitlements? We know that the system logs any changes made to an entitlement and the business reason / justification. But can this data be extracted for analysis and audit purposes?

Thanks in advance for any help!

Kind regard

Tom

entry.title: SAP EMS Configuration settings
entry.content:
Hi All,

Can you tell me where to configure the Business categories, Rights, Entitlement types, Attributes, statuses in SAP EMS system? Is it in front end FIORI Apps screen or is there any backend system available to configure?

Regards

Naga

entry.title: Send entitlements from SAP EMS to CPI
entry.content:
Hello

Is there standard outbound interfaces documented somewhere for SAP EMS system where there is possibility to Send entitlements via middleware SAP CPI to external systems?

entry.title: SAP EMS - whats the best practice to link SOM/S4 business partner to EMS customer
entry.content: SAP EMS - whats the best practice to link (BRIM SOM contract /S4 Sales order ) business partner to EMS customer - As the question says, when we have multiple business partners with partner functions like SH,SP,PY or BP or any other , what is sap recommendations or best practice to link the EMS customer to which SAP BP above ? IS it generally Ship to partner.?

entry.title: Subscription Billing And Entitlement Management
entry.content:
When you are working with subscription billing and entitlement management in Public Cloud, does the sandbox for these 2 tenants get decommissioned when requesting the production tenant for Subscription Billing and EMS.

Wondering if it is similar to the process where the provisioning request of the production system for the S/4HANA public cloud causes the S/4Hana sandbox to go away

entry.title: is the Entitlement Management system customizable?
entry.content: ex.we want to add modules to the offering, we want to add a new screen to capture SIM card information that will be activated later by the customer..etc

entry.title: SAP EMS- Challenges in Using Batch jobs to update EMS status for CAN and EXP business event
entry.content:
Hello EMS experts, 

Our scenario is S4 subscription contract via CPI to EMS  record update .

we need some inputs on  the best way to handle Cancel the EMS record when  CPI is sending Cancel business event and end date of contract . 

In EMS,  end date is updating, but status is not getting update as CAN . Is there any code to add in Rule sets . If yes,  where and what to add to get desired status updates.

Thanks

Srinivas

entry.title: SAP EMS objects
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Can you please provide your views on the below?

Does SAP entitlements created in EMS system need to be existed as a separate object in upstream systems as well?

For example, if warranty is an entitlment , then a service contract is necessarily to be created in S/4HANA also? or say a software entitlement require a order/contract for software services need to be created in S4HANA as well alongwith license as a entitlement created out of entitlememt model in EMS?

 

Thanks

Sam
